website_summaries.verdict: A reusable fabric Advent calendar at an affordable price.
pros: The durable fabric construction means the calendar can be used again and again
Includes 24 stuffed toys, but the pockets can also accommodate extra treats
The brightly colored ornaments stick to the tree with hook-and-loop fasteners
cons: Fasteners seem to lose their stick after a while

customer_reviews.title: Living up to the nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: I had this advent calendar growing up and it was one of my favorite Christmas memories. I’m now 26 living on my own and was incredibly shocked to find this. I am unbelievably happy with this purchase. It is the same one that I had as a child with a few minor changes that I don’t mind. All of the little ornaments are the same shape and having this in my home gives me a sense of nostalgia and comfort. Thank you to this company for giving me that. I am forever grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Kary

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure that they will have fun counting down till Christmas
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was so quick and the item was well packaged. This is my twin boys first advent calendar. I'm sure that they will have fun counting down till Christmas. It says that "Lost pieces are replaced promptly and free year after year" which is good. Most likely my boys will lose the pieces years time and we can still get the replacements and keep using it. I'm hoping this will become our family tradition. Thank you for such a great product! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than i had expected!!
customer_reviews.text: I never take the time to write reviews unless i am disappointed with a product and want to warn people from purchasing. I felt like i needed to write something about this calendar. It is so cute and very well made. It truely seems like something that i will be able to pass on to my son for him to use with his kids one day. I am so excited to make this an annual tradition every christmas with my son. I highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this because my mom had a similar one when I was a child. I always remember fighting over who got to put Santa up that year. Anyways, my only complaint for why I have it a 4 instead of a 5 is the bows. The Velcro doesn’t stick to the bows on the tree so you have to squish them together in between the bows. Otherwise I love it. Would buy again. It’s very well made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality and perfect size. Excellent customer service. ours came missing one piece and they had the replacement sent the same day I contacted them. Plus you can order replacement pieces if you ever lost them! Timeless family heirloom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Advent calendar for a lifetime
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these calendars from my grandmother DC when my children were young and was thrilled to find it still available for my own grandchildren now!
customer_reviews.author: Zerbe

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic decoration
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and how it looks. Don’t like some of the shapes choosen; few “what’s that” moments.
customer_reviews.author: fowler1985

customer_reviews.title: Traditions live on
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved it, just like the one I grew up with that my mom still has. My son and I placed each item on its day. Velcro works, wish they had a Ms.Claus but 5star first boy Christmas tradition
customer_reviews.author: GASutherngurl

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Have had one of these since our adult kids were babies. A huge part of our family tradition and memories. Have now started ordering them for grandkids and everyone is thrilled because they were “fighting” over who would get the original. By the way the original is 27 years old. Still looks great and the ornaments still stick to the tree like they are supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Walters

customer_reviews.title: lasting gift
customer_reviews.text: We only just bought this but it seems well made and appears like it last a long time. It is really cute - I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but you’ll be glad you bought it.
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey IMO but I finally gave in and purchased this advent calendar for my kids and they LOVE it! They looked forward to putting up each piece everyday and would argue with each other over who’s turn it was (kids!). I am happy I bought this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy LaMartina

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Tradition
customer_reviews.text: This is of very good quality, and I'm sure we will use for it years to come, which is what I wanted. It's a great educational tool for my toddler as well, from learning her numbers to learning patience! Putting just one "present" on the tree each day and looking forward to (i.e., delaying gratification) doing more the next day are wonderful life lessons. I'm so happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Wicksie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little hands
customer_reviews.text: Some of the threads were unwinding on the numbers after some use, but it didn’t make a huge difference on the whole. The shapes were really cute and well made. My little one had so much fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: SYR_B

customer_reviews.title: Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: I just wish there had been a little more religious figures in it. Eg - baby Jesus for Christmas Day. It was purchased for my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: customer1

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift! Looks great and should last for many years!
customer_reviews.author: P. O. Connor

customer_reviews.title: Super cute advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves decorating the tree with the velcro pieces. The only challenge is to keep her from taking and hiding her favorite pieces. Will be bringing out every year!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Viana

customer_reviews.title: good size and the stitching looks to be of good ...
customer_reviews.text: good size and the stitching looks to be of good quality. doesn't have that cheap made in china look you might expect from something like this.
customer_reviews.author: plebsareneeded

customer_reviews.title: Great  Advent calendar for a young family
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for grandson and family - everyone raved about it.
customer_reviews.author: Knittenorma

customer_reviews.title: Made well, would definitely reccommend anyone to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Had one when my kids were small, now I bought one for my granddaughter and it's just like the one I used to have. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: cali

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Looks gorgeous! Perfect size! Beautifully detailed! An heirloom piece for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Klee

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift & family loved it. A little pricey, but it should last for future years.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the one my mom used to have.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: I have been looking for something like this for my Grand daughter--I had one for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for something like this for my Grand daughter--I had one for my children as they were growing up--much better than ones that have chocolate in them. I am sure this will become a true family tradition!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This advent calendar is so cute, I can't wait ...
customer_reviews.text: This advent calendar is so cute, I can't wait to give it to the grandkids so they can start counting down the days until Christmas! Seems durable and should last for quite a few years. very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy to find this Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to find this Advent Calendar. About 25 years ago I bought one almost exactly the same, now my children are grown and married and wanted one "like mommy and daddy have". I was thrilled to be able to give them their very own and they were thrilled to get them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this advent calendar. Quality materials used. I was not disappointed at all!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my grandchildren...I just embellished each little piece with sequins to make them sparkle!
customer_reviews.author: PeggyDiane

customer_reviews.title: and he loved doing the day to day acitivity of this
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is 2, and he loved doing the day to day acitivity of this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. Was a bit bigger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Was a bit bigger than I expected, but that isn’t a negative. It’s sturdy & should last many years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and very well made. We are very happy with the advent calendar.
customer_reviews.author: gary l.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality!! Not what I expected for the price. I ordered for my daughter and now I will be ordering one for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Williams

customer_reviews.title: A hit with two year olds!
customer_reviews.text: It's a lovely, fun, safe, interactive calendar that my two-year-old twin grandsons love.
customer_reviews.author: CathK

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this company
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. I have been looking for this specific one! Arrived quickly and quality is top notch. I recommend this company!
customer_reviews.author: LMB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and sturdy. Best part is that they will send you a new piece if you lose one.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M. Schubert

customer_reviews.title: Best value. Great puchase!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Everyone in my family was jelous after it arrived, wishing they had purchased one for their kids too! It exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L Allen

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was very happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I sent The Merry Christmas Tree Advent Calendar to my 4 year old grandson. He loves it !!!! My daughter was very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Smittys

customer_reviews.title: Memories of the past, new again
customer_reviews.text: My husband grew up with an advent calendar similar to this one - When I found this one, ordered two (one for each of our girls). My husband was so excited to see I'd found an advent calendar much like the one he grew up with. Good size, construction and pockets are big enough to hold a treat, as well as the 'ornament', for each day. It is well made, and we are so excited to present them to the girls this holiday season..
customer_reviews.author: KMoeller68

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The advent calendar is adorable and just what we were shopping for; thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Calendar is well made and SOOOOO much easier than sewing your own. The ornaments don't have the beautiful details you find on many other calendars like this since they are almost all pre-stamped and then sewn/stuffed. My kids don't mind and I guess I wouldn't either if I hadn't grown up with a handmade one. Considering the price, though, this is a worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fun Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cloth Advent calendar for my grandchildren similar to one I made for my children years ago. I looked at all the available calendars and read tons of reviews. This one fills the bill. The background and tree are very attractive. The decorations are fine (except some of the details on them are printed, rather than sewn). I like the idea of velcro attachments. All in all, I'm happy with the result, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SSF

customer_reviews.title: Amazing detail!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t not pay attention to the dimensions of this calendar so I was pretty surprised how big it was! A pleasant surprise! The embroidery detail is wonderful! My only complaint is the Velcro on the backs of the pieces snag embroidered numbers on the pockets when my children pull them out. Easy fixes though!
customer_reviews.author: VLB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect advent calendar!!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for!! We had an advent calendar similar to this one when I was growing up! We have a 16 month old daughter and she loved being able to put the “ornaments” on the tree! This will be our new Christmas tradition for years to come!! It is wonderfully made and durable!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This advent calendar is great! My grandsons (6 & 7) love decorating the tree when they come out to visit. It's easy to get the decorations out of the little pockets and they stick nicely on the tree with no effort.
customer_reviews.author: tami hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter loved this! She was so excited to put a new piece on the tree each morning And i love how it gave her a visual of how long until Christmas! We will be using this every year!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but all the ornaments do not fit well on the tree. They also do not all stay on well. Some may really like it. Just was not for me. I re-gifted it.
customer_reviews.author: Seagullcaller

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and something I can hopefully pass down to my children someday. Only complaints are some of the stitching isn’t great on the ornaments, but I’m assuming it’s handmade. The present ornament’s bows are uneven, and the Velcro on the wreath ornament was sewn onto the wrong part to hang the wreath properly.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Foley

customer_reviews.title: so happy
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this Advent calendar. For our grand daughters. Our children had a similar one while growing up that they loved. So happy to find this and with the quality. And the replacement plan!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Countdown
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these for my daughters who love Christmas, Will become a holiday tradition to Christmas each year, Made really well,
customer_reviews.author: John - St. Charles Il

customer_reviews.title: Great Product !!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted, very well made, should last for a very long time. As long as my dog doesn't eat the "ornaments".
customer_reviews.author: James Skinner

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old great niece and nephew loved decorating the tree on each ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old great niece and nephew loved decorating the tree on each advent day. Very soft and safe and comes with a free replacement guarantee if any piece is lost. This alone makes the calendar worth it.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Gift.
customer_reviews.text: We were very please with the Advent Calendar. The plastic covering was very thin. It would be nice if it were heavier material so it could be used to keep it in from year to year.
customer_reviews.author: Dan J

customer_reviews.title: Great for the holidays!
customer_reviews.text: looking for a similar one from my childhood and this one is close! Nice features but wish the backing was felt and a bit thicker feeling Overall nice purchase for our family!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Burke

customer_reviews.title: Count down
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Puffy advent pieces for my son to put up. Reminded me of our handmade one growing up minus the sequins. Started our own memory and tradition.
customer_reviews.author: Their Mom

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! The quality really surprised me. So happy with this purchase. Merry Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: amand

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and bright, inviting pieces.
customer_reviews.text: We were very pleased with the quality of this product and pleasantly surprised that lost pieces would be replaced at no charge! Our grandson loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Joan B. McAdams

customer_reviews.title: Cute and the kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Velcro could be better. I have a feeling I will be replacing the Velcro on the backs of the stuffed figures next year due to the stick wearing off quickly.
customer_reviews.author: DJR029

customer_reviews.title: Our family tradition continues...
customer_reviews.text: It is just what I wanted. I gave it to my son and his precious wife as a wedding gift. They loved it and are excited to continue our family tradition...mine is 25 years old.😊
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Sering

product_meta.title: Pockets of Learning Merry Christmas Tree Advent Calendar, Holiday Décor, Seasonal Fabric Wall Hanging, Cloth Countdown
feature_bullets: Fabric Christmas Advent Calendar with 24 stuffed ornaments waiting in embroidered pockets to be placed on the tree
Children and families enjoy the anticipation of Christmas with this festive Advent Calendar
Superior quality construction to last through the years
